3330.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|79|309$إِنَّمَآ|"Only|55|68|102$أُوتِيتُهُۥ|I have been given it|153|166|13535$عَلَىٰ|on (account)|107|120|52$عِلْمٍ|(of) knowledge|119|132|4620$عِندِىٓ‌ۚ|I have."|76|88|5609$أَوَلَمْ|Did not|67|73|2346$يَعْلَمْ|he know|75|84|13536$أَنَّ|that|48|65|240$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|70|184$قَدْ|indeed|63|80|1097$أَهْلَكَ|destroyed|86|103|11697$مِن قَبْلِهِۦ|before him|107|124|3324$مِنَ|of|50|67|156$ٱلْقُرُونِ|the generations|124|132|8775$مَنْ|who|50|56|76$هُوَ|[they]|62|74|298$أَشَدُّ|(were) stronger|124|136|711$مِنْهُ|than him|77|89|571$قُوَّةً|(in) strength|104|116|7723$وَأَكْثَرُ|and greater|97|109|13537$جَمْعًا‌ۚ|(in) accumulation.|140|146|11034$وَلَا|And not|72|97|25$يُسْــَٔلُ|will be questioned|138|188|11754$عَن|about|58|108|1105$ذُنُوبِهِمُ|their sins|85|134|13538$ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ|the criminals.|124|149|7155$

3332.verse: وَقَالَ|But said|73|87|1089$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|116|20$أُوتُواْ|were given|92|119|940$ٱلْعِلْمَ|the knowledge,|121|148|9942$وَيْلَكُمْ|"Woe to you!|107|134|11484$ثَوَابُ|(The) reward|107|121|4538$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah|81|88|606$خَيْرٌ|(is) better|88|102|520$لِّمَنْ|for (he) who|103|117|1356$ءَامَنَ|believes|73|87|111$وَعَمِلَ|and does|80|94|621$صَـٰلِحًا|righteous (deeds).|142|156|622$وَلَا|And not|72|79|25$يُلَقَّـٰهَآ|it is granted|100|185|13543$إِلَّا|except|65|234|86$ٱلصَّـٰبِرُونَ|(to) the patient ones."|171|256|13544$

3333.verse: فَخَسَفْنَا|Then We caused to swallow up,|232|242|13545$بِهِۦ|him|52|72|204$وَبِدَارِهِ|and his home,|112|132|13546$ٱلْأَرْضَ|the earth.|92|112|197$فَمَا|Then not|80|100|132$كَانَ|was|57|67|913$لَهُۥ|for him|65|75|977$مِن|any|50|70|53$فِئَةٍ|group|57|77|7186$يَنصُرُونَهُۥ|(to) help him|128|148|10805$مِن دُونِ|besides|101|121|224$ٱللَّهِ|Allah,|56|76|2$وَمَا|and not|71|91|46$كَانَ|was|57|67|913$مِنَ|(he) of|66|233|156$ٱلْمُنتَصِرِينَ|those who (could) defend themselves.|275|442|13547$

3334.verse: وَأَصْبَحَ|And began,|95|108|13340$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|116|20$تَمَنَّوْاْ|(had) wished|106|133|13548$مَكَانَهُۥ|his position|94|121|6808$بِٱلْأَمْسِ|the day before|118|145|8106$يَقُولُونَ|(to) say,|88|102|753$وَيْكَأَنَّ|"Ah! That|97|165|13551$لَا|not|42|110|30$يُفْلِحُ|will succeed|100|134|5489$ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ|the disbelievers."|133|133|4590$

3335.verse: تِلْكَ|That|54|60|1038$ٱلدَّارُ|the Home|83|95|889$ٱلْأَخِرَةُ|(of) the Hereafter|139|151|890$نَجْعَلُهَا|We assign it|101|113|13552$لِلَّذِينَ|to those who|108|120|750$لَا|(do) not|75|87|30$يُرِيدُونَ|desire|94|100|4112$عُلُوًّا|exaltedness|98|117|10221$فِى|in|48|85|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the earth|92|129|100$وَلَا|and not|71|108|25$فَسَادًا‌ۚ|corruption.|92|129|4935$وَٱلْعَـٰقِبَةُ|And the good end|138|157|6728$لِلْمُتَّقِينَ|(is) for the righteous.|163|163|34$

3330.verse: He said, "I was only given it because of knowledge I have." Did he not know that Allah had destroyed before him of generations those who were greater than him in power and greater in accumulation [of wealth]? But the criminals, about their sins, will not be asked.

3331.verse: So he came out before his people in his adornment. Those who desired the worldly life said, "Oh, would that we had like what was given to Qarun. Indeed, he is one of great fortune."

3332.verse: But those who had been given knowledge said, "Woe to you! The reward of Allah is better for he who believes and does righteousness. And none are granted it except the patient."

3333.verse: And We caused the earth to swallow him and his home. And there was for him no company to aid him other than Allah, nor was he of those who [could] defend themselves.

3334.verse: And those who had wished for his position the previous day began to say, "Oh, how Allah extends provision to whom He wills of His servants and restricts it! If not that Allah had conferred favor on us, He would have caused it to swallow us. Oh, how the disbelievers do not succeed!"

3335.verse: That home of the Hereafter We assign to those who do not desire exaltedness upon the earth or corruption. And the [best] outcome is for the righteous.

3336.verse: Whoever comes [on the Day of Judgement] with a good deed will have better than it; and whoever comes with an evil deed - then those who did evil deeds will not be recompensed except [as much as] what they used to do.
